Description: Datto’s Autotask Professional Services Automation (PSA) is a powerful and intuitive cloud-based PSA platform providing a singular view of the entire business - enabling MSPs to centralize business operations and make data-driven decisions to improve service, productivity and profitability.
Name: Autotask

Methods.Name: List New Contacts By Company
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts associated with the specified company, created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts created since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts By Company
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts associated with the specified company, updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Retrieves contacts updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List Contacts By Company
Methods.Description: Retrieves all contacts associated with the specified company.

Methods.Name: List Updated Companies
Methods.Description: Retrieves companies updated since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List New Companies
Methods.Description: Retrieves companies created since the last time this action was executed.
